validationRules.name: Campos_Cualificacion_RO

validationRules.errorMessage: The opportunity is blocked because it is in the Closed stage. If you want to make a change, contact the System Administrator or the Financial Controller.

validationRules.errorMessage: In order to close the opportunity as Contracted or awarded, you must indicate the Contracted year opportunity (€)
validationRules.name: Cerrada_sin_contratado

validationRules.name: Cerrada_sin_estado_cierre

validationRules.errorMessage: The ``Awarded´´ check must be marked when the award date is informed

validationRules.errorMessage: Must report if any occurrence outside of Spain in the Qualification tab before moving on to the next subphase
validationRules.name: Check_produce_fuera_Spain

validationRules.errorMessage: This subphase cannot be selected due to the type of offer of the opportunity
validationRules.name: Cierre_limitacion_subfases

validationRules.errorMessage: Cannot generate an opportunity if the Client does not have the Sector and Subsector informed
validationRules.name: Cliente_Sector_Subsector

validationRules.errorMessage: The opportunity cannot be closed as won as the client does not have SAP Account IB #. Please contact CAU-DEF
validationRules.name: Codigo_Contable_Cliente

validationRules.errorMessage: Before proceeding to Pending Approval it must have the SAP Bid Code filled in
validationRules.name: Codigo_Oferta_SAP

validationRules.errorMessage: In order to go to contracted, you must indicate the contract amount.
validationRules.name: Contratada_sin_importe_contratado

validationRules.errorMessage: You must specify an amount in the Contracted Year Opportunity (€) field
validationRules.name: Contratado_Ano_Introducido

validationRules.errorMessage: The Contracted year opportunity must be less than the total Amount in euros.

validationRules.errorMessage: The Opportunity has presale, you cannot select this subphase
validationRules.name: Cualificacion_con_preventa

validationRules.errorMessage: The Opportunity does not have presale according to its type. If you need presale, please consult with the administrator
validationRules.name: Cualificacion_sin_preventa

validationRules.errorMessage: Cannot create an Opportunity related to a blocked Client
validationRules.name: Cuenta_Bloqueada

validationRules.errorMessage: This opportunity has a breakdown of amounts, you cannot modify the Amount fields
validationRules.name: Desglose_importes

validationRules.errorMessage: Please upload the mandatory documentation of the Opportunity to New file before closing it
validationRules.name: Documentacion_Cierre

validationRules.errorMessage: Cannot advance to Approved stage as CEO & COO Email field is not informed
validationRules.name: Email_CEO_COO

validationRules.errorMessage: Inform Bid Status
validationRules.name: Estado_de_madurez_ITDS

validationRules.errorMessage: The submittal date must be prior to or the same as the closing date
validationRules.name: Fecha_Presentacion_Cierre

validationRules.errorMessage: Submission Date must be before or equal to the Closing Date and Closing Date must be before or equal to the Production Start Date
validationRules.name: Fecha_SME

validationRules.errorMessage: Award date is mandatory for awarded opportunities
validationRules.name: Fecha_adjudicacion_obligatoria

validationRules.errorMessage: Closing Date must be later than the month prior to the current month
validationRules.name: Fecha_cierre_posterior_mes_pasado

validationRules.errorMessage: For closing status ``Contracted´´, the closing date must be equal to the contract signature date
validationRules.name: Fecha_de_cierre_igual_a_fecha_contratado

validationRules.errorMessage: Inform the Billing Contact before proceeding to the next stage
validationRules.name: IB_SME_Contacto_Facturacion

validationRules.errorMessage: Inform the Main Contact before proceeding to the next stage

validationRules.name: IB_SME_Importes

validationRules.errorMessage: The total amount of an opportunity cannot be 0

validationRules.errorMessage: Inform the field Submitted offer Amount(excluding VAT) in the “Economic Data” tab before proceeding to the next phase

validationRules.errorMessage: Inform Business Unit
validationRules.name: Informar_Business_Unit_BL

validationRules.errorMessage: Must inform the AJI code
validationRules.name: Informar_Codigo_AJI

validationRules.errorMessage: Inform the Delivery Center before proceeding to the next subphase
validationRules.name: Informar_DeliveryCenter

validationRules.errorMessage: Inform the Commercial reference field on the Closing tab as it is a won and closed opportunity
validationRules.name: Informar_Referencia_Comercial

validationRules.name: Informar_Referencia_Comercial_Nombre

validationRules.errorMessage: Inform Contract signing date before closing the opportunity
validationRules.name: Informar_fecha_firma_de_contrato

validationRules.errorMessage: As it is an Engineering opportunity it cannot advance to this subphase
validationRules.name: Ingenieria_subfases

validationRules.errorMessage: Award date must be greater than filing date
validationRules.name: Mayor_o_igual_que_fecha_presentacion

validationRules.errorMessage: For awarded opportunities, the award date must be less than or equal to the close date
validationRules.name: Menor_o_igual_que_fecha_cierre

validationRules.name: Menor_o_igual_que_fecha_firma_contrato

validationRules.errorMessage: You must fill in the Market, Division and Operations Address fields.
validationRules.name: Mercado_Division_Obligatory

validationRules.errorMessage: Inform Reason for closing
validationRules.name: Motivo_de_cierre_obligatorio

validationRules.errorMessage: Cannot advance from subphase as there is no Offer approvals
validationRules.name: No_avanzar_subfase_Aprobada

validationRules.errorMessage: Cannot inform the Commercial Reference until the Opportunity is Closed and Contracted
validationRules.name: No_informar_Referencia_Comercial

validationRules.errorMessage: Cannot modify the following fields: Market, Market Sector, Market Subsector, Services, Delivery Center
validationRules.name: No_modificar_Mercados

validationRules.errorMessage: Changing the stage is not permitted. You must receive the offer code from the tender team and the status will be automatically updated.

workflowTasks.description: An offer code has been requested but 2 days have elapsed and we have not received a response; you must submit a claim in order to move forward with the opportunity
workflowTasks.name: Reclamar_C_digo_de_Oferta
workflowTasks.subject: Claim Offer Code

workflowTasks.name: Reuni_n_QA
workflowTasks.subject: QA Meeting

workflowTasks.name: Revision_QA
